basics.name: Thanh Ly
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science:Security Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

work.summary: Intern at HII-Mission Technologies in the workforce development program
highlights: Work alongside subject matter experts from multiple disciplines across the program
Utilize technical and inter-personal skills and knowledge to support ongoing projects
Participate in briefs, meetings, and educational courses

work.summary: Assist with the daily operations of OVSS
highlights: Assist patrons on any questions about VA education & health benefits
Assist in OVSS outreach at campus center
Assist OVSS director in community project

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
